name: The Octots
description:
The Octots tells the story of a community caught between the primitive world and the present world.
You will give life to a character whose entire family was killed by the enemy tribe and then escaped from them.
Survive against hunger, thirst, wild jungle life.


Survive among wild animals in hunger, thirst and harsh night conditions.


Survive the wild world with 7 different unique tool and 14 different weapons


Make clothes for yourself with the items you collect from the forest and the skins of the animals you hunt.


Build the house of your dreams with your collect from the forest. (Dynamic modular base building system is supported.)
Craft your furnace, campfire, storage box, standing torches, stonewall, bed and to be survive.


Build and manage your farm with water management and plant growth cycles.
(New plant and fruit species will be added.)


Explore the jungle and fight with 4 passive and 3 active animals.

Development Roadmap

  • Combat Mechanics
  • New Furnitures
  • New Building Types
  • Complex Farming Mechanics (New Seeds)
  • Smooth Day & Night Cycle
  • New Islands
  • Water Vehicles (Raft, Boat)
  • Underwater Design
  • Multiple Language
  • Item Stack (Inventory System)
  • Steam Achievements
